headline: 'Twisted Sister' represents 'traditional, conservative' values: GOP candidate
author: Bob Brigham
sentences:

"Bummed to learn that @deesnider, the man with the perfect song written decades ago about the attack on traditional, conservative American values 'We're Not Gonna Take It' is riding the train in the wrong direction.

You funny.https://twitter.com/Sessler/status/1512558618746359811\u00a0\u2026
 Dee Snider\ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8 (@Dee Snider\ud83c\uddfa\ud83c\uddf8) 1649488354
Donald Trump has endorsed Loren Culp in the race.
Jerrod Sessler, a former NASCAR driver running against Rep. Dan Newhouse (R-WA) in the GOP primary discussed Twisted Sister vocalist Dee Snider on his Twitter account.
GOP views on heavy metal band Twisted Sister have shifted significantly in the half-century since the band was founded.
After consideration, Snider wrote that Sessler might actually be a Republican he can support.
You think i wrote a song in support of "traditional American values"?
How could it be that he sang for us but now fights for them?"
The first line of my song is WE'VE GOT THE RIGHT TO CHOOSE!
Can I count you amongst us pro-choice people?
Snider found the argument to be hilarious.
